verbose_text: Histological analyses of skin and lung samples stained with H & E or MT (for collagen identification) showed that BLM injection in WT mice increased dermal thickness, caused greater ECM deposition in the dermis, and induced greater fibrosis of adipose tissue in the subcutaneous layer relative to the results following injection of PBS.
evidence: BLM injection in WT mice increased dermal thickness, caused greater ECM
